long_desc:
Product Features



  • Ratchet feature a socket-retaining drive tang and deeply knurled, nonslip handle

  • 43-tooth ratchet mechanism

  • Chrome Vanadium steel forging for strength & durability

  • Polished chrome surface for maximum corrosion protection

  • 3/4" Sliding T-Handle

  • 100 and 200 mm 3/4" extension bars

  • Blow molded case

description.name: Adjustable Wrench 0-19 mm 6"
description.long_desc:
Adjustable Wrench with a large knurl for easy adjustment and a tight jaw fit. Special hex jaw construction helps reduce slippage and tightly grips the bolt for solid and secure operation. A wide handle provides comfort and reduces fatigue during extended use.


Product Features



  • Capacity: 0 - 19 mm

  • Jaws offset at 22°

  • Drop-forged steel construction

  • Chrome finish resists rust and corrosion

  • Laser etched scale for easy and quick size adjustment

  • Slip-resistant bi-material handle for a comfortable grip

  • Length: 6"

description.name: Lockwrench WR 10"-250mm dual colourPVC handle
description.long_desc:
Self-locking bottom jaw- the pivot of the jaw enables to grasp the element properly, providing the maximum clamp without slipping.

The release mechanism with protection provides easy opening of the jaws and at the same time protects against an accidental release.

Adjusting screw provides control of the release and affixes particular materials well.

description.name: Locking Pliers Set 4pcs 125mm - 250mm
description.long_desc:
Zestaw szczypiec zaciskowych morse'a 4el. W skad zestawu wchodz szczypce w rozmiarach 125-250 mm. ruba regulacyjna zapewnia kontrolowane zwolnienie i dobrze mocuje poszczeglne materiay.

Charakterystyka produktu

  • szczypce w rozmiarach 125 250 mm
  • atwe zaciskanie i zwalnianie szczypiec
  • szczypce proste o wyduonych szczkach
  • szczyce o szczkach zaokrglonych w trzech rozmiarach
  • regulacja siy zacisku
  • regulacja stopnia rozwarcia blokady szczk
  • zestaw umieszczono w pachcie z moliwoci zawieszenia

Dane techniczne

  • Rozmiar szczypiec: 150, 175, 175, 250 mm
  • Materia wykonania: stal stopowa, tworzywo sztuczne

Zawarto zestawu

  • szczypce morse'a szczki zaokrglone 250 mm
  • szczypce morse'a szczki zaokrglone 175 mm
  • szczypce morse'a szczki zaokrglone 150 mm
  • szczypce morse'a szczki proste 175 mm

description.name: 12-Point Ratcheting Combination Wrench 10mm
description.long_desc:
12-Point Ratcheting Combination Wrench 10mm. Ratcheting Box-End needs as little as 5 degrees to move fastener in comparision with 30 degrees standard box-end.


Product Features



  • 72-tooth ratcheting box-end

  • Open end angled 15 to flip and re-engage in tight spaces

  • Special drive design reduces fastener rounding

  • Chrome vanadium steel forging for durability

  • Chrome finish provides anti-corrosion protection
